INSERT INTO performanceTime(performanceId, hallId, startTime, endTime) VALUES
( #{performanceId}, (SELECT hallId FROM performance WHERE id = #{performanceId}), #{performanceTimeRequest.startTime}, #{performanceTimeRequest.endTime} )
mapper.select:
SELECT id, date_format(startTime, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S'), date_format(endTime, '%Y%m%d%H%i%S') FROM performanceTime WHERE hallId = (SELECT hallId FROM performance WHERE id = #{performanceId}) AND
( DATE(startTime) BETWEEN DATE(#{performanceTimeRequest.startTime}) - 1 AND DATE(#{performanceTimeRequest.startTime}) + 1 )

SELECT COUNT(s.priceId) AS remainingSeats FROM seat s INNER JOIN seatPrice sp ON s.priceId = sp.id INNER JOIN performanceTime pt ON s.perfTimeId = pt.id WHERE sp.ratingType = #{ratingType} AND pt.id = #{perfTimeId} AND s.reserved = false

SELECT TIME(pt.startTime) AS startTime, pt.id AS perfTimeId, sp.ratingType AS ratingType FROM performanceTime pt INNER JOIN seatPrice sp ON pt.performanceId = sp.performanceId WHERE pt.performanceId = #{performanceId} AND pt.id = #{perfTimeId}
